Module compiler
Package compiler.common.report

Class Location

java.lang.Object
compiler.common.report.Location
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Locatable
public class Location extends Object implements Locatable, Loggable
The description of a location within a source file.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final int

    The column number of the first character of the specified part of the source file.

    private final int
    endColumn
    The column number of the last character of the specified part of the source file.
    private final int
    endLine
    The line number of the last character of the specified part of the source file.
